childrenSupport.headline: Yahan seekh ka safar kaisa hota hai?
paragraph: Hum bachchon ko sirf padhate nahi — unhe samajhna, sochna, share karna aur mil-jul kar kaam karna bhi sikhate hain.

Classes ke saath-saath activities, games, workshops aur mentoring ke through
bachche confidence, discipline, communication aur life-skills develop karte hain.

fields.title: Education
fields.headline: Protecting Education, Protecting the Future!
fields.description: From early childhood to adolescence, quality education unlocks human potential. Safe classrooms, girls' participation, and digital access remove barriers across India.

fields.title: Health
fields.headline: Protecting Health, Protecting the Future!
fields.description: We ensure health and nutrition for children through awareness campaigns, system strengthening, and partnerships with government bodies.

fields.title: Resilience
fields.headline: Building Resilience for Tomorrow
fields.description: Empowering children and communities to adapt and thrive through climate awareness, disaster preparedness, and emotional strength.

fields.title: Livelihood
fields.headline: Ensuring Livelihoods for Families
fields.description: Uplifting families through skill development, vocational training, and placement support for sustainable income.

fields.title: Protection
fields.headline: Safety & Protection for Every Child
fields.description: Creating safe spaces, preventing abuse, and advocating child rights through legal and community interventions.

fields.title: Humanitarian Aid
fields.headline: Humanitarian Aid with Dignity
fields.description: Rapid response during emergencies — food, shelter, and continuity of education — delivered with dignity and care.
